projects.name: StillALive
projects.description: A real-time personal safety and digital check-in application designed to help users share live status updates, trigger personalized emergency notifications. Built with React Native and Firebase.

projects.name: Kozeo
projects.description: A consumer-facing social and project collaboration platform that connects computer science students with real-world, paid projects to build verified experience, portfolios, and industry exposure.

projects.name: NirogyaSaathi
projects.description: NirogyaSaathi is a doctor-facing digital healthcare management platform used to securely maintain patient records, manage outpatient (OPD) workflows, and generate digital prescriptions.

projects.name: SatvikYoga
projects.description: SatvikYoga is a freelance project for a yoga studio where I built a fully responsive, visually calming website aligned with their brand identity, featuring service details and integrated video content for an engaging user experience.
